description: Nothing I try seems to work, sad times
Great program, the only thing missing is a choise on what size you want to scale to. sill. AMAZING!
Nice, works well, has some problems with shadow areas
summary: Nice, works well, has some problems with shadow areas

description: Intel Iris Xe 96 EU from 11th gen i7 works until 3x upscale. 4x got Encoding Error, but unsure it's because of GPU or else. And it's using the default REAL-EASRGAN. Not yet test the others. The quality is remarkable. But people faces become smooth like using instagram effects. Probably because of the type chosen. Keep up the good work!
summary: Works with Integrated GPU up to 3x

description: Displays an error stating that you must use a Vulkan compatible GPU to run the tool. Despite running it on the AMD discrete GPU in my laptop, it still does not work.
Can't set output folder, its randomly set path whatever it want, after upsailing cant find image at folder it choose so nothing work here (Ubuntu 22.04)
Not work!Not work!Not work!Not work!Not work!Not work!

Does exactly as the description leads. I found some nice wallpapers but they were of low quality, luckily I found this program and I just upscaled it form 1080 to 4k literally in minutes. I can't wait what more this program will offer in the future! (Ubuntu 22.04.3)
